subject: College Athletics
Football
Colleges and Universities
Drunken and Reckless Driving
Traffic Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: A Yale student received a special probation that will leave him with no criminal record for an accident in 2011 in which the truck he was driving struck and killed a woman and injured two others.
snippet: A Yale student received a special probation that will leave him with no criminal record for an accident in 2011 in which the truck he was driving struck and killed a woman and injured two others.
